assignments.description: Set Primary Source = Marketing and Secondary Source = Telemarketing External if current user is an External Telemarketing User.
assignments.name: Auto_Set_Sources_External_Telemarketing
assignments.label: Auto Set Sources External Telemarketing

decisions.description: If the user is an External Telemarketing User then automatically set the Secondary Source to Telemarketing External for the newly created Lead and do not provide options to set Sources.
decisions.name: External_Telemarketing_User_Decision
decisions.label: External Telemarketing User?
